Summary: Two white spheres moving at high speed.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There was one other sighting in Indianapolis on or around June 24th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my porch looking at the stars and watching the planes moving in the sky when I noticed a bright white sphere moving in the sky from the NE and eventually veering to the North. The spheres where bright white and had no blinking lights. It was very high in the sky and above the normal airline traffic. It was too big to be a satellite and wasnt high enough to even be considered a satellite. The speed was 5x faster then the air traffic that I was observing. I immediately contacted an associate that lives on the other side of the city. He confirmed seeing the white sphere but had seen two of them moving in the same direction. I had limited visiblity of the sky due to tree obstructions and had not seen the second one.
